map.beginners_land.name: Beginner's Land
map.beginners_land.description: A starting area for new adventurers, with gentle rolling hills, a peaceful forest, and a welcoming village.
The central hub of the village, surrounded by small shops and the town hall.
map.beginners_land.rooms.town_hall.name: Town Hall
map.beginners_land.rooms.town_hall.descr: Where the village's issues are discussed and resolved. A helpful place for new adventurers to learn about the region.
map.beginners_land.rooms.inn.name: The Weary Traveler
map.beginners_land.rooms.inn.description: A cozy inn with warm beds and good food, offering rest for weary adventurers.
map.beginners_land.rooms.general_store.d: A store selling various goods and supplies necessary for adventurers.
map.beginners_land.rooms.guard_post.name: Guard Post
map.beginners_land.rooms.guard_post.desc: The local militia's post, safeguarding the village. Warriors can often be found here.
map.beginners_land.rooms.peaceful_forest: A serene forest with well-trodden paths, home to harmless wildlife.
map.beginners_land.rooms.training_ground: An open field with targets and dummies for adventurers to practice their skills.
shop.general_store_inventory.name: General Store Inventory
shop.general_store_inventory.description: A variety of items for the beginning adventurer, from rope to healing potions.
item.rope.name: Hemp Rope
item.rope.visual: A sturdy length of braided hemp rope.
item.rope.description: Useful for climbing or binding, this rope is a staple in any adventurer's pack.
item.healing_potion.name: Healing Potion
item.healing_potion.visual: A small vial containing a red, sparkling liquid.
item.healing_potion.description: A potion that heals minor wounds when consumed. An essential for any adventurer.
item.torch.name: Torch
item.torch.visual: A simple wooden stick wrapped at one end with cloth soaked in flammable pitch.
item.torch.description: Provides light in dark places or can be used to start a fire.
item.bread.name: Loaf of Bread
item.bread.visual: A freshly baked loaf of bread, still warm.
item.bread.description: A basic food item that restores a small amount of health and staves off hunger.
creature.forest_critters.name: Forest Critters
creature.forest_critters.visual: Small animals like squirrels, rabbits, and birds.
creature.forest_critters.description: Harmless creatures that inhabit the Peaceful Forest, offering an easy challenge for beginners.
item.small_fur.name: Small Fur
item.small_fur.visual: A patch of soft fur from a small forest creature.
item.small_fur.description: Can be sold or used in crafting. A reminder of a novice adventurer's first forays into battle.
weapon.tiny_claws.name: Tiny Claws
weapon.tiny_claws.visual: Tiny, sharp claws suitable for a small creature.
weapon.tiny_claws.description: These claws aren't much of a threat to an adventurer, but they can still scratch.
